summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RheumaCare e-prescription portal. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Login functionality with correct credentials (doctor/rheumacare2024)
Invalid login properly rejected with 401 status
Prescription form loads with all required fields
OP No and Patient Name input fields work correctly
Diagnosis and Clinical History textarea fields work correctly
Drug autocomplete - search for 'WYS' shows 'WYSOLONE'
Frequency dropdown has all required options: 0-0-1, 1-0-0, 1-1-1, 1-0-1
Custom frequency option available and functional
Duration unit dropdown has Days, Weeks, Months
Add drug button adds new drug row successfully
Remove drug button removes drug row correctly
Create prescription saves to database and redirects to view
Prescription history page shows saved prescriptions
View prescription displays all details correctly
Download PDF generates and downloads successfully
Print button functionality works
All backend API endpoints return correct status codes
JWT authentication working properly
Drug search API returns WYSOLONE for 'WYS' search
PDF generation creates valid PDF files
Doctor info API returns correct doctor details

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor issue with error message display for invalid login)
